modules.description: Provides methods to display native toast notifications with custom duration and position. Accepts strings for message content and integers for timing controls. Used to inform users of app events without interrupting workflow, such as confirming form submissions or indicating loading states.

Creates a styling configuration for a toast with customizable opacity, colors, and padding. Constructs toast options by combining a message, duration, position, offset, and styling. Displays short or long toasts at specified positions with success or error callbacks, and supports custom options or hiding the toast.
